text:
*[Bug 18547] `citation(pkg = "foo")` doesn't handle URLs well*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18547>

Sebastian Meyer (<mailto:seb.meyer@fau.de|seb.meyer@fau.de>) changed:

           What    |Removed                     |Added
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
                 CC|                            |seb.meyer@fau.de

--- Comment #13 from Sebastian Meyer (<mailto:seb.meyer@fau.de|seb.meyer@fau.de>) ---
(In reply to Duncan Murdoch from comment #1)
I recently came to the same conclusion when analyzing/fixing another
`citation()` bug with newline-separated URLs. In addition to the reasoning
given above: many bib styles put the note before the url, which would
effectively reverse the order of the URLs. So now, thanks to Kurt, R (>=
r86676) no longer appends extra URLs to the note field.
